targets.query: SELECT mean("Pcharge") - mean("Pdischarge") FROM "inverter" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Pactouser") - mean("Pactogrid")  FROM "inverter" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Plocalload")  FROM "inverter" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("Ppv")+mean("Pdischarge")+mean("Pactouser")-mean("Pactogrid")-mean("Pcharge")) FROM "inverter" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Ppv") FROM "inverter" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("pvPower") FROM "inverter" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT  FROM "inverter" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
